header.#text: Effect of violation of this section

text.#text:
A covered Federal rule that is promulgated in violation of this section shall have no force or
			 effect.

Any party may bring an action in a district court of the United States to declare that a covered
			 Federal
			 rule has no force or effect because the covered Federal rule was
			 promulgated in violation of this section.
